
-------------------------------
INCIDENCE INFORMATION
Jeanette Birnbaum 3/17/17
-------------------------------

The files in this folder come from IARC AND GLOBOCAN 2012:

http://ci5.iarc.fr/CI5I-X/Pages/download.aspx

Individual registry files will be added to this folder as the project develops. The name will keep the original file name (which is the registry number) with a country abbreviation appended. The Òfiles_to_selectÓ Excel and CSV files are used to compile selected files into this folder, adding the country abbreviation.

Data will be formatted using scripts in bcimodel/data-raw

Below is the subset of the registries currently included, selected from the full registry which includes
high-income countries not of interest to this project.

14540199	                                                  Malawi, Blantyre (2003-2007)17100199	                                              South Africa, PROMEC (2003-2007)17160270	                                         Zimbabwe, Harare: African (2003-2006)17880299	                                                    Tunisia, North (2003-2005)18000299 Córdoba (2004-2007)20320799	                                                Argentina, Mendoza (2003-2007)20320899	                                       Argentina, Tierra del Fuego
